page.title: 20THE"TROUBLES" IN ENNISKILLEN
page.content: The area covered by the block is dominated by the urban area of Enniskillen.The town has had its fair share of trouble since the{"Troubles"} began in the late 1960's.The Tax Office, the Library,the main street, the Forum,and other places have all been bombed at different times. Rebuilding has given the main street a modern appearance.But at night the town centre is virtually a ghost town. The main{shopping area}is closed to traffic from 6-30pm until 8-30am,from the East bridge as far as the two main churches.During the day vehicles have to pass through a security checkpoint to get up the main street.Most night life is to be found to the east rather than the west of the area.Any pubs or cafes in the main part of the town have suffered badly because of the troubles and the recession.
